projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with modern technologies. Features include real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and responsive design.

projects.title: AI Image Generator
projects.description: An artificial intelligence powered image generation tool that creates unique artwork based on text descriptions using deep learning models.

projects.title: Smart Home Dashboard
projects.description: A centralized IoT dashboard for monitoring and controlling smart home devices. Includes real-time data visualization and automated scheduling.

projects.title: Blockchain Wallet
projects.description: A secure cryptocurrency wallet supporting multiple chains with built-in DEX integration and real-time market data tracking.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics
projects.description: Advanced analytics platform for social media marketing with sentiment analysis and engagement tracking capabilities.

projects.title: Cloud File Manager
projects.description: Secure cloud storage solution with file versioning, sharing capabilities, and end-to-end encryption for sensitive data.
